Summary: Black Triangle hovering, gliding in silence
divs: sighting detailsit was summer 1985,,, me, my brother michael, and my best friend mike toney were throwing a baseball, playing catch in the middle of our street. it got dark real late. we lived on a military base..ft. huachuca which is outside of sierra vista, az. i don't remember who saw it first but we looked up and there was this large black triangle gliding silently but you could hear a low hum....it went over us and circled around then went behind the mountains next to our base and came over again and went straight....on the object there were 3 white lights on the points of the triangle object and a red light in the middle and it would go off\on slowly. it was probably about 5000 feet above us maybe... but it glided slowly... and i didn't hear an engine roaring...we lived on a military base...all i can say it was definitely a ufo..i kept this with me for 25 years but thanks to tnmufon she told me to report it so i did. .the photo attached is a good drawing of what i witnessed on that evening
